poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
Stuck at this one. Howk it out
The ball from the ruck,
Spud from sod, stone from tread
Shard of root from gum
And then what?
The hook:
A left to the jaw and a barb in the right
Nostril, poorly cast, the catch line
Caught, but, and you can't
Get it out of your head.
